issue.title: edgetag.io CNAME tracking servers
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.11.27

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://clearstem.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

customers.edgetag.io
fallback.attntags.com

These are the main endpoints, often used as CNAME. It's being used by many websites. Here's some examples,

https://clearstem.com
kqefj.clearstem.com --> fallback.attntags.com
lftce.clearstem.com --> lftce.customers.edgetag.io

https://lapolicegear.com
hbpvm.lapolicegear.com

And a list of 142 domains I found that point to this CNAME (if you'd like to add as Individual cname tracking system):

edgetag servers

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: https://www.creditkarma.com/calculators/auto/rv-loan
issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version ublock ### What type of problem have you encountered? Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc. ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.creditkarma.com ### Ad Blocking EasyList, AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: app.titan.email

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://app.titan.email/login/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.titan.email%2Flogin%2F) ### Comment ``` Email login is not possible because AdGuard Home DNS is blocking it. When I deactivate AdGuard DNS, I am able to log in successfully. According to the logs, the following URL was being blocked: api.flockmail.com. I added an exception rule to allow it: `@@||api.flockmail.com^` Please investigate why this domain is being blocked by default. ``` ``` Username: @hArDsTyLe2000 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/smbpdl40gnkcsw0000occc4cc8s8wkseeubonxzw14.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/18ep82ciilc08ooks4gs8ggcgscwckk673rokcpqr4.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS DNS setup: | AdGuard Home DNS server: | Private AdGuard DNS server System version: | `Raspberry Pi 5, Raspberry Pi OS` Browser: | Firefox Blocklists: | General:
AdGuard DNS Custom filters: | `https://adguardteam.github.io/HostlistsRegistry/assets/filter_2.txt`,
`https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/master/GermanFilter/sections/adservers.txt`,
`https://raw.githubusercontent.com/easylist/easylistgermany/master/easylistgermany/easylistgermany_adservers.txt`,
`https://easylist.to/easylist/easylist.txt`,
`https://secure.fanboy.co.nz/fanboy-cookiemonster.txt`,
`https://easylist.to/easylist/easyprivacy.txt`,
`https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RPiList/specials/master/Blocklisten/Phishing-Angriffe`,
`https://raw.githubusercontent.com/liamengland1/miscfilters/master/antipaywall.txt`,
`https://ublockorigin.pages.dev/filters/filters.txt`,
`https://pastebin.com/raw/XnE2ZfJv`,
`https://filters.adtidy.org/windows/filters/14.txt`

comment.body: @Alex-302 Tested now again. Same error, when I add to "Unblock subdomains" `api.flockmail.com` it is working without problems. Maybe this clarity.ms is causing error.
